summary: Completed frontend auth tests with data-testid alignment verification and backend API testing. Login form works perfectly with all required data-testids. Backend APIs are 74% functional but have membership activation issues preventing full dashboard access.

critical_bugs.issue: Users invited to organizations are not getting their memberships properly activated
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents access to protected routes like /dashboard/finance and /ingest/csv

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Invite emails sent but membership activation fails

integration_issues.issue: Users redirected back to login when accessing /dashboard/finance due to membership issues

passed_tests: Login form data-testid alignment (login-form, login-email, login-password, login-submit)
RBAC protection - VIEWER correctly blocked from /ingest/csv
Onboarding flow endpoints (Xero OAuth, companies discover/select)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix invite acceptance flow - users are being invited successfully but their memberships are not being activated properly, preventing access to protected dashboard routes. The backend test shows 'No membership in org' errors for invited users.
